At the conference, representatives from 45 countries and regions jointly issued the World Trade Declaration, jointly setting out the global textile industry development goals and visions.

The World Booking Declaration states that, for the future, the countries concerned will adhere to the principle of openness and coordination, continuously promoting industrial and market connectivity, and jointly upgrading the development level of the industrial chain; will adhere to the principle of scientific and technological drive, continually strengthening basic research, applied research and technological transformation, and jointly upgrading the basic capabilities of the industry; and will bring cohesive fashion and fashion into full play, so as to give full play to the role of textile and clothing as cultural carriers and bridges of civilization, and jointly enhance the cultural value of the industry.

Loureno Bartholomei, president of the Brazilian Fashion Designers Association, said in an interview that the publication of the World Trade Declaration would help countries to upgrade the textile industry chain and achieve sustainable development.

Construction of more than 100 national patents completed in Tianjin Zhou Daofu, the first high-rise building in northern China

The first high-rise building in northern China, the Tianjin Zhou Daofook Financial Center, was completed on the afternoon of the 26th ceremony in Tianjin Binhai New Area, marking the success of the high-precision BIM cooperative management platform in skyscraper construction.

The Tianjin Zhou Daofu Financial Center is located in the Tianjin Economic and Technological Development Zone, with a total construction area of 390,000 square meters, four floors underground, 100 floors above ground level, 530 meters of building height, including Grade A offices, luxury apartments, ultra-five-star hotels, and so on.

The project department of Tianjin Zhoudaefu Financial Center in Beijing, China, has a total steel capacity of over 70,000 tons. The height of the weld at the top of the project is about 376,000 meters, equivalent to 42.5 Zhumulama peaks. The weld wire can be used in 40 circles around the earth.
The complexity and processing difficulty of Tianjin Zhou Daofu project are unprecedented.

Industry sources say the Tianjin Zhou Daofu Financial Centre has taken the lead in implementing the all-encompassing management of the Building Information Model (BIM) in building or building skyscrapers across the country.

Creatively put forward and successfully implemented the "three full BIM application" mode with full staff participation, full professional application and full process implementation, and developed a collaborative management platform based on high precision BIM model.

In the course of Zhou Daofu's construction, the project department first carried out BIM construction in the virtual world, carried out scientific verification before physical construction, thus eliminating in the germination the problems of previous construction construction that may have resulted in demolition and rework.

In 2017, the BIM Innovation Achievement of the Chow Tai Fuk Financial Centre Project was awarded the first prize of the Global Engineering Industry Global Excellence Award at the Global AU Master Hub and the 2017 Global Engineering Industry Excellence Award.
During the construction of the project, the project department created more than 130 national patents.

It is worth mentioning that the innovation achievements of the BIM project and the promotion of scientific and technological innovation in Tianjin have not only made the complex and diverse construction links a success, but also reduced the construction time by more than four months, and led to a significant improvement in safety management and other aspects.
Recently, the Tianjin Zhou Daifu Financial Center Project also won the 2019 ISA International Security Award.
86th Central Maine and Thailand Mekong Joint Patrol Enforcement completed.

At 15: 30, three Chinese law enforcement boats and two Lao law enforcement boats engaged in joint patrols on the 86th Central Maine and Thailand Mekong were successfully docked at Guanlu Port, China, marking the successful conclusion of this joint patrol.
The operation was launched on the 24th in Guanlai port, and lasted four days and three nights.
During the operation, the formations conducted joint patrols and anti-drug publicity activities in the key waters of the Golden Triangle, Banxiango, and Mengmo.

In addition, the Chinese side sent a police training mission to the Lao People's Liberation Army (LPA) 122 and 133 Border Guard Company to exchange operational police skills, effectively enhancing the emergency response capability of the law enforcement personnel of both sides to handle emergencies jointly.

In Qingsheng, Thailand, the four countries held a law enforcement cooperation exchange meeting to inform each other of their recent situation in border management, combating drug crime and the security situation in the Mekong Basin, and to consult and exchange views on strengthening information exchange, research and law enforcement cooperation.
At the end of the operation, the two sides will continue to conduct a 10-day joint training and sub-mission to improve Mekong river security and stability.

The commander of Thailand said that since the start of the Mekong Joint Patrol Law Enforcement, the countries of China, Myanmar and Thailand have been in close contact, deepened practical cooperation and achieved fruitful results in such many fields as law enforcement security cooperation and cultural exchanges.

We hope that the quadripartite law enforcement cooperation will continue to deepen and expand, so as to open a new situation of law enforcement cooperation among the four countries and make new contributions to the security and stability of the Mekong river basin.

Pilot operations of self-driving taxis supported by the Chinese government may be expanded everywhere.
Since 26, Baidu uses 45 self-driving taxis for trial operation, Changsha City passengers can apply through the dedicated website.
There are "safety guards" in the driver's seat to ensure the safety of passengers.
The road, which provides pilot operation, is 50 km by the end of 2019 and is planned to be extended to 135 km by the first half of 2020.
The vehicle is a pure electric vehicle "Red Flag EV" of China's FIA Group, equipped with the system developed by Baidu's Apollo program and supported by the Chinese government.

In addition to Toyota and Honda, Baidu's Apollo program is attended by more than 150 companies, including Volkswagen of Germany, Daimler of Germany, Ford Automobiles of the United States, Intel of the United States, Microsoft of the United States and Nvidia of the United States.
Around China's self-driving taxis, China's largest ride-hailing service has announced plans to launch 30 self-driving taxis on the outskirts of Shanghai this year.
China's self-driving development competition may become more intense.
Taiwan scholars suggest: "Uncertain times" Taiwan businessmen need to follow China to develop mainstream industry
"2019 Taiwan Business Innovation Forum" 26, 27 days in a row held in Taipei.
Several representatives of Taiwan businessmen and academics were invited to share their experiences on business transformation, innovation, succession and market development.

The forum was hosted by the Taipei Institute of Management Management and co-hosted by the Group of Yin Jinding Securities, the Distinguished Continental Taiwan Trader Alliance and other organizations.
The two-day conference was divided into several seminars, such as the transition upgrade mode and business strategy, which were attended by more than 100 participants.
Chen Mingzhang, president of the Taipei Institute of Management and Management, said China-China trade frictions continued and Taiwanese traders faced "uncertain times."

In his view, Taiwan traders need to keep pace with the times and keep pace with the mainstream industries in China, with particular attention to innovative products related to science, technology, culture, tourism and health.
"In the past, Taiwan businessmen valued quality, effectiveness and delivery.
Chen Mingzhang said that the Taiwan merchants only have the above conditions are no longer sufficient.
He pointed out that Taiwanese enterprises need to combine speed and service, speed up the supply chain, and attach importance to extension services and services for domestic products.
In addition, "service added value" is a new field that Taiwan businessmen can develop vigorously.

Speaking on behalf of Taiwan Trader, Xu Wentang, chairman of Guangdong Trader Yayi Electronics Co., said that Yayi Electronics had experienced operational difficulties as a result of the sudden reduction in orders.

It took three years for the enterprise to realize its revenue by taking out the traditional electrical business, transforming vehicle electronic equipment and entering the smart home appliance industry.
Sun Shen (Zhuhai) Electronics Co. Ltd. General Manager Bai Hongzhang suggested that if developing new customers difficulties, better focus original customers to provide "one-stop" services.

Customer replacement is not different from service poor, high price, low quality, slow delivery speed, fewer varieties, integrity issues 6 factors, so long as this solution, together with timely product line reform, product category expansion, enterprises will become customers non-replaceable suppliers.
The 2019 Distinguished Mainland Taiwan Trader Award, also hosted by the Taipei Institute of Management, was held in Taipei.

According to Taiwan Economic Daily, Lu Zhengzhang, the managing director of Golden Land Corporation, which operates the center in Shanghai, received a "Distinguished Taiwan Trader and Cross Strait Contribution Award."
New rules to solicit opinions: social capital to obtain rural land management rights need qualification
Social capital acquisition of rural land management rights requires qualification

The Measures on the Management of Rural Land Management Right Stream is to be publicly consulted and proposed to supervise the acquisition of land management right by social capital transfer such as business enterprises

Yesterday, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs posted on its website a notice for public consultation on the Measures for the Management of Transfers of Rural Land Management Rights (Draft of Revision) (hereafter referred to as the Opinions Draft).
The draft opinion is now open to the public for comment.

The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs said that in order to implement the newly revised Law on Rural Land Contracting, further consolidate and improve the basic rural management system, deepen the reform of the rural land system and implement the system of "three rights division", the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs revised the Measures for the Management of the Transfer of Rural Land Contracting and Management Rights and formed the Opinions Draft.
Beijing Youth Daily reporters learned that for the first time published Opinions draft has a number of important changes.

The newly revised Law on Rural Land Contracting clarifies the scope of land transfer, implements the concept of "three powers of division", sets up the "right to contract and manage land" and "right to manage land" respectively, and makes a clear distinction between the transfer, swap and transfer of land contract and management rights (leasing, subcontracting, acquiring shares or other means).

In this opinion draft, in order to implement the concept of "three rights division", it responds effectively to the general thrust of the Law on Rural Land Contracting, and considering that there are great differences between the parties, procedures and supervision of the transfer of land management rights and the exchange and transfer of land contract management rights, the revised draft defines the scope of the transfer, focusing on the transfer of land management rights, including leasing, share, and so on.
The transfer and exchange of land contract and management rights will be stipulated separately.
According to the Opinions draft, under the "three right division" background, farmers only have a fixed period of land management right.

Theoretically, even if bankruptcy and liquidation occur, farmers only risk losing the right of operation for a certain period of time, so it is no longer legally necessary to provide for the return of the contracted land to the original contractor, and there is also a conflict with the Bankruptcy Law.
In order to prevent the risk of farmers losing their land, the method of preferred shares, ex-rent shares and repurchase has been developed in practice.
Considering that the preferred stock has a mature theory in the company law, it is suggested that it should be used as an advocacy provision to protect against the risk of losing shares.
